Ordinary differential equations¶

Solving the ODE initial value problem (odeint)¶

mpmath.calculus.odeint(derivs, x0, t_list, step=<function ODE_step_rk4 at 0x01310330>)¶
Given the list t_list of values, returns the solution at these points.
